The stairway access from the street is through double doors (that do not lock) and is a long ascent to the hallway landing and apartment door. Other guests have noted the music from the restaurant below, but it stopped about 9:00 and did not keep us awake. The one negative: there are no hooks/closets in the apartment
This was my second time using this location, and I will again in the future. Extremely helpful and open communication. Also, it’s the most comfortable bed I’ve ever laid on 😂
Good place
Mske sure to visit jmaries restaurant underneath apt. John owns and runs this place and it is very good food
I had great communication with Kaitlynn and Will. The check in instructions were very easy to follow and accurate. The apartment was very cute and perfect for my momcation!

Spent week at location for work. Good location and parking next to building was abundant. Plenty of dining and shopping options within walking distance or very short drive. Apartment is in an older building but plenty to like.

I have stayed here before and was happy with the accommodations. It is a cute apartment with everything you need to feel at home. The bedroom is spacious and the bed is extremely comfortable- didn’t want to get up and go to work! The sitting room was the perfect place to sit and have a glass of wine and watch TV. you are above a restaurant and can hear the music but with the TV on it was not a problem. The music was off 10 so was no problem sleeping This trip I took a day and walked to all the cute shops , did some shopping and enjoyed my coffee in the coffee shop just a block away and ate dinner J Marie’s which did not disappoint! I will definitely stay here again especially since I signed an extension on my travel nurse assignment .
Great hosts and will look to book here again!
Overall very nice place, no where to hang up your clothes but the owners were very nice and had great communication
Was very unhappy with the music downstairs
What a fabulous place to stay! So much to see and do and in such a lovely little town, hope to come back soon!

Will was very accommodating and friendly. We felt very welcomed by everyone in the community and his staff as well.
We had a great view to downtown, which we loved! We would definitely stay again.
Wonderful apartment for overnight/weekend stays. Great location in downtown Wapak! Very clean space and hosts were accommodating.

The apartment was perfect. Great location, I am a travel nurse and wanted to try something other then a hotel! Will definitely stay here again, decor was nice , bed super comfortable and had everything I needed to feel at home!

The apartment was easy to get into with the lockbox and communication with the hosts was good. Some other reviews mention the restaurant music below. You can definitely hear the music, though I honestly found that the car alarms going off on the street/street traffic to be louder than the restaurant downstairs.
The location is downtown and there are several restaurants and shops on the street. The donut shop across the street was tasty! The kitchen in the Airbnb does have some things, but if you’re staying for a while and plan to cook I’d recommend bringing some of your own essentials. For example, I brought my own cooking spray, baking sheet, and spatula. There also weren’t oven mitts available during the time of my stay.
The bathroom was clean and nice. There is a heat lamp above the shower, which was so nice! There’s no ac in the building, but I didn’t feel too hot with the fans running and window ac unit.
Overall, the place is as described and my stay was what I expected!
Great place to stay downtown Wapakoneta.
Clean, comfortable. Great location. The restaurant below has delicious food and friendly, helpful wait staff. Will communicated in a timely fashion and had good recommendations for local activities.
Very neat little apartment. Private area. Super nice for a single person to stay or a couple. Plan on coming back a 3rd time at some point.

One of the best Airbnb’s I’ve ever stayed in. The bed is incredibly comfy and the entire place has a cozy feel. We got a chance to meet the maintenance man and he was so sweet and really funny. Would definitely stay here again.

Great, trendy place to stay in the heart of Wapak. It’s a little on the warm side being that it’s an old building with high ceilings & only a window unit for air conditioning (and we came in July). That aside, it was prefect for what we needed. Great communication, friendly hosts, soft clean bed, and a cute town to explore. We’ll definitely try to book this place every time we visit!

Wonderful host! Nice area it was perfect for us! The restaurant in which this apartment is located over is the BEST the food is wonderful the service is better! It is a great location small mom and pops stores all around we had a great visit everyone was so friendly! Visited the space museum just a few blocks away also it’s a must see! Can’t say enough about the trip definitely will be returning!
Awesome!
The places as accurately described and pictured. Kaitlynn answered my question in a timely manner. She let us have a late check out when asked. No complaints!

Lots of downtown noise until around 11pm. Bed very comfy, couch was filthy but i understand it was replaced right after i checked out. Bring your own: bath soap, dishsoap, hand towels.
A/C in bedroom, ceiling fans in other rooms. No cable tv.
Clean, spacious and in the heart of town. Communication was excellent and we knew exactly what to do at check in and check out. A must book if you are staying in Wapak
Great place, great location, amazing communication.
Very comfortable apartment in the heart of downtown “Wapak.” J-Marie’s downstairs is super yummy and reminds you to go have fun. :) I can’t wait to return to check out more!
Very nice place to stay.
Fun walk-up with super cozy bed & lots of space! Communication was outstanding & everything was delightful for my quick in-and-out stay!
Great little town birthplace of Neil Armstrong I did not know that until I got there. The apartment was grea. clean comfortable bed great value
Wonderful communication, assistance to help above and beyond just booking your stay.
Met our needs nicely. Well furnished. Would be great for those wanting to check out the town. Above a pub so a little noisy but they shut it down by about 9.

This spot is a great value in a very good location. Hosts are wonderful about communicating! They were also quite hospitable & helpful. Just understand you will be climbing some stairs to access the apartment.
This is a great spot to stay if you are in the area. Just be aware that you will be climbing stairs to get to the apartment. The hosts are very attentive and helpful and great about communicating.
This was a wonderful stay for us. It does get a bit loud between the busy downtown and the restaurant. However, we would stay here again.
Fantastic stay great communication between us and the renters 10/10

Our host was so kind and extremely helpful in accommodating all of our needs. The apartment was very nice and roomy with lots of amenities like toiletries, coffee, and kitchen utensils. We stopped in at the bar/restaurant beneath the apartment which had really great food and a full bar. You could definitely hear the music from the bar til about 10 at night but it didn’t bother us too much. Might be good to keep in mind if you have kids or like getting to bed early, however. Overall we were super comfortable and would definitely stay again!

We enjoyed our stay here. It felt as if we stepped back in time. Love that the place had coffee and bath supplies. Cozy and fun place to stay. We walked everywhere and enjoyed local shopping, dining, and the Alpha!
Great location, clean and very comfortable bed!

My only complaints are that the wifi is the guest wifi from the bar downstairs and that the music from the bar is quite loud until the place closes. Luckily it was only 9 or 10 o’clock but it can be a nuisance.

The apartment was exactly as advertised. Small and cozy with out being cramped. Right in the historic down town, there are great places for food and coffee within walking distance. Check in was super easy and clear directions were given. I would definitely stay again.
Amazing communication! Place was easy to find and super cute! I will book with them again for sure!
Great host. Clean home. Bed was very comfortable.
Great host, loved the welcoming and hospitality.

across the board 5 stars. I was delighted to stay in Kaitlynn and Wills apartment for the weekend. several things I recommend for all looking at this place, meter your expectations and recognize this is not the holiday inn express. for the value this place was exceeding all expectations. with the privacy and space of a full unit, I was blessed to have all my needs and creature comforts met. they provide a wide array of amenities to make your travels more comfortable. the bed was perfect. it was apparent that they have made some remodels, most noticable was the bathroom. you could really see the love and care put into trying to make this home the absolute best. I appreciate Will and Kaitlynn opening their abode in this manner and for all the communication to help with the check in process as well

Quick contact with the owners of the house for answers to all questions. Access to the premises is possible without any problems at any time. Good location of the house in the city center. Convenient large free parking next to the house. Very warm and clean in the rooms, in the kitchen and in the bathroom. There is Wi-Fi. There is noise and music from the restaurant on the ground floor, but it stops at 10pm. We will gladly recommend this place for relaxation and travel.

Kaitlynn and Will’s property was very clean and very well decorated. The location was great and within walking distance of many shops and restaurants. They reached out to me a few times to make sure I had everything I needed. Check in was a breeze and I loved the privacy. Would definitely stay here again.
Great area. Loud on the weekends but kinda expected that with the location. Very reasonable rate and would stay again.
This apartment is in a super location close to everything downtown. The apartment has everything that you need and more. And the hosts are super. Very responsive and will answer any questions.

This apartment was a great alternative to a hotel in downtown Wapakoneta! The host was very communicative and the apartment was fully stocked with extra toiletries in case you forgot yours. As others have written, the train is super close by, so I don't recommend this stay for light sleepers.

I understand there were personal and COVID related situations going on but this was not a good experience. The code provided to get the key was not accurate so 2 people had to come and get me in. The listing says there are parking passes but there wasn’t one so I had no idea if I was going to wake up and my jeep was gone. There were no washcloths to take a shower. No instructions on how to use the tv, not a power strip so that all 3 devises for the tv could be plugged in at once. The bedroom furniture is horribly positioned to where you can’t plug in your phone and accessories to charge while you’re sleeping. Consider taking your own coffee accessories and be prepared to wash any dishes before using.
Great place, great location and cheaper then a hotel on hamburger row!!

The best place to stay in Wapakenta. Make sure to visit the Temple of Tolerance. The hosts made us feel right at home. There is nothing that would have made our stay any better. My very best experience at an Airbnb so far.

FABULOUS location, exceptionally clean! Trains run through downtown at night fyi and there is no parking on the street in front overnight! Kaitlynn is wonderful to communicate with and helps in anyway she can. It is stocked with necessities of all kinds. Restaurant below is wonderful and there are several other bar/restaurants nearby. Don't miss the candy/coffee shop a block down!
Sweet little apartment! Just the right space for a night away when traveling! I want to come back and explorexall the little shops downtown!
Great place, cool town, and friendly people.
Great place to stay, great location and hosts are great at communicating! Would definitely stay here again. Comfortable and cozy.
Great place to stay and fantastic Hosts! Loved it!
We had a great stay at Kaitlynn & Will’s place. Really nice and cozy downtown apartment for a really great price. I would highly recommend it!
Very comfortable bed, spacious and was the perfect location for my stay. Thanks again!

Nice apartment at a good price. Comfortable bed, cute decor. We only stayed one night, and the main thing I would change might be more dark curtains or coverings on the windows, as it gets very bright early in the morning. Otherwise, cute place in a nice little town!
The downtown apartment was just as promised. Clean, comfortable and easy. So much better than a hotel. Definitely will have to stay here again.
Cute little apartment in a cute little town
Very clean, good place to stay at, has a great restaurant to eat at below.
Kaitlynn& Will’s place was a very cute place to stay—we enjoyed it very much and would stay again.
Clean, comfortable, and spacious apartment with a comfortable bed.

Highly recommend this cute apartment!
Perfect spot! Great communication. Cool space.
The apartment was cute, and very clean. The location was right in town, above a really neat restaurant. I recommend the buffalo chicken mac and cheese.
Great Place. Great location.

Our stay was great! Hosts recommendation to eat at J. Marie's was so worth it. We enjoyed the quiet livingroom space and the movies that were provided. Shower necessities were available if you had forgotten and multiple kinds of coffee. We will definitely keep this place in mind for the future! It was a great value too!
The hosts were very hospitable and quick to respond.
Very nice cool room, very simple and comfortable, highly recommend for a few nights in! Great lighting and a supply of movies in case you forget to bring your own
Perfect place, very clean and comfortable for a reasonable price. Quick communication. I will definitely come back.
Nice place
Everything was great. Staying in Lima for a few weeks for work. Only reason I didn’t rebook was because it booked up before I could rebook! Hosts were quick to respond to questions! Nice place!

The apartment was adorable and at a great price! My husband and I live in the country so the trains and the traffic outside made it a little hard for us to sleep. But the apartment itself was adorable and wapak is a cute little town. We only needed Kaitlynn and will once and they answered my questions right away!

I was an extended stay guest. I was visiting from out of town for work and stayed for about 6 weeks. I was absolutely enamored with the old town feel of downtown Wapak and was met with kindness on a daily basis. I was very pleased with the place, everything is as they say it is. As others have said, the bed is extremely comfortable...I slept like a rock. The noise from the restaurant downstairs can be a little loud at times but they shut down at a reasonable hour and a fan In the bedroom drowns out any residual noise. The only thing I missed was local television, especially being an extended stay guest. Hulu live saved me during football season!! The hosts are fantastic and responded to any questions I had immediately. I would look forward to working out of town again if I could stay here.
Also, I don't believe the Amenities stated that pots and pans are included...they are. This was a pleasant surprise.
It’s a very nice place very private if you like stairs and the exercise you’ll like this place that’s the only bad thing the stairs
Very nice place right downtown Wapak!!
Great location downtown, comfy bed; pretty basic accommodations, but a good price.
Great location, thoughtful hosts, highly recommend.
It is what they say it is great place
Great little apartment in a small Ohio town! The decor is really cute and plenty to do. I would highly suggest checking into this place!
Highly recommended...in a great location, clean, affordable and comfortable.
Was a good place in a good location
I will be back in one month, thanks again !!
Nice cozy little place above a terrific restaurant. Had a nice morning walk along the river, watched the geese. A few stairs to climb but the bed was nice and comfy.

Super stylish place, much bigger than I expected. Restaurant downstairs is amazing, and they will treat you even better if they know you're staying upstairs. I stayed on a weekend, and while the living area had a lot of noise from downstairs, the bedroom didn't. I will definitely plan a trip out here again!!

This is a really cute place that probably shined at one point getting the 5 star reviews but it seems to be slowly getting a bit less attention. The price at $50 is great but with all the fees added at $85 you might be better off at the motel 6 in Lima. There was some spots of mold above the shower and the kurig/coffee machine looked like it hadn't been cleaned or restocked in some time. Otherwise it's a fine place to stay and very comfortable.
Stylish, comfortable loft type apartment in a Victorian building with a super restaurant downstairs.
Nice place.
I will rent this place again.
Nice place. Well located. Very responsive hosts.
Nice apartment. Located in the heart of town. Perfect base for working in area.

The apartment is so well located. J Marie's restaurant downstairs is wonderful. Nice coffee shop across the street with incredible breakfast burritos. Place was clean and roomy with nice soft sheets. It is so much nicer than staying in a hotel. Hosts were very quick to respond to any questions. Check in is easy. Close by street parking with pass provided by host. There is some light coming in windows from being downtown, so if you are sensitive to that a sleep mask may be desirable.
The place was nice, clean, and efficient. I will come back!
The space was very roomy and comfortable, close to neat stores and a great restaurant down below.
Great place. Great location. And great food downstairs. Would definitely recommend to anyone in the area.

This quaint apartment is a wonderful alternative to a boring hotel room. It offered a comfortable space to relax, a spacious bedroom and a kitchen with many amenities including a full-size refrigerator and stove. As Floridians, we were so pleased that the heat kept the area toasty warm. The owners were super responsive with questions and information. The check-in and check-out processes were quick and easy. The restaurant downstairs is considered the best in town by our friends who are locals.

I stayed here during my clinical rotation at St. Rita's Medical Center. It's about a 20-25 minute drive from this location to St. Rita's which was super easy. The apartment is right above J.Maries which is a super cute restaurant right below if you don't feel like cooking. J-William and Kailtynn were super easy to get in contact with and were really good about answering back promptly if I needed anything at all. There's the Wapak Athletic Club (WAC) within walking distance and some other really cute boutiques in the town if you are also in the mood to shop!
We really enjoyed our stay. The location was great and they were easy to work with.

My fiancee and I stayed here over a weekend while visiting family in town. The location was fantastic, with restaurants and shopping all within walking distance. The bathroom is a little bit on the tight side and the shower is rather low, if you are 6 feet tall or above you will be ducking, but it gets the job done. There was a full kitchen including a fridge/freezer, stove, microwave and toaster. Netflix on the tv was a plus while relaxing at night. The bed was super comfortable, if you are sensitive to light in the morning, maybe bring a face mask because it was rather bright in the room. All in all, we enjoyed our time here.
Small and quaint,comfortable bed ! Great restaurant down below @ J.maries must eat there!

I stayed here for a month while working in Lima. A great little place! Definitely the best I could find in the area. Very cute, modern and stylish inside. It sits right above their restaurant J Marie’s which in my opinion has the best food in the greater area. I’m a California Bay Area native and am used to a certain level of cuisine, J Marie’s was the only place who could compete! On top of the house and restaurant, they were excellent hosts. During my stay they went through a traumatic and tragic family event, yet still did their best to stay in touch with me and make sure I had everything I needed to have a comfortable stay...beyond great hospitality! I would mention it can get loud at times with the restaurant being right below, but I honestly never found it to be an issue. With the TV on the sound was easily blocked out and in the bedroom the fan and heater being on would also do the trick. I would definitely recommend this place with my highest regards to anyone who finds themselves in need of somewhere to stay in the area!

Communication leading up to the stay was terrible. Bathroom was dirty and in serious need of remodel. Bedding appeared to be dirty but they said they were clean. This was the place chosen for son and his wife on the night of their wedding as they are from out of the area and wanted someplace close to the venue. Planned to stay 2 nights but only stayed 1 night because it was that bad. Daughter-in-law wouldn't even shower there.
Second time enjoying my stay here in Wapa. Really the best airbnb for location and price in town. Great value.
Awesome apartment on top of J Marie's restaurant. Had a great stay and would recommend to future visitors.

The apt is as described and the location excellent, for me anyway. Many places within walking distance, local theater, bakery, coffee houses, dining, antique shops, etc. The restaurant below is popular with locals but I would not describe the noise as excessive. I do come from the big city so other reviewers may differ. It ceases when the place closes and the parking pass provided works except for the specific hours mentioned on the pass. I used it for 3 days with zero issues. The apt is a great space and good value for the area. Shotgun style floor plan and has every room expected. Enter through kitchen, with stand-up shower/bathroom then living room then bedroom which looks out towards the main blvd. Tastefully decorated and everything works, strong WiFi, window unit AC that did the job. Communication was excellent and would say John is well on his way to being a terrific airbnb host. Recommended

Expect a well ventilated, spacious apartment with an amazing bed and living arrangement. It’s only my 3rd time using Airbnb and this was easily my favorite. The parking is right outside by tons of places. I’d stay there again without a doubt.
We had a great time! Visit the restaurant below the unit.
Beautiful building with cute apartment. Take the time to have dinner at J Marie’s. Great food, service and locals to visit with.
A nice cozy one bedroom apartment in downtown, historic Wapakoneta
Great place to stay while in Wapak!
Nice simple apartment.

Really cute space with everything we needed. It is very loud at night between the restaurant downstairs (died down around 10:45pm) and the train that goes by periodically throughout the night. Hosts are very open in disclosing about noise, so not a complaint, more of an additional heads-up. Bed was super comfy! And Netflix on the TV made my night! :)

This place was great and cozy! There was a tv with a smart DVD player that had Netflix capabilities, and a Keurig. It was in a great part of town that was convenient for getting coffee and food! The only downsides were that there was a permeating smell and it never went away no matter what we did. Windows don't open and so without AC it gets quite hot, and the cable box wasn't and couldn't be hooked up.

A super cute place in a hip building. Check in was easy and the accommodations are just as pictured. My only discomfort was the lack of A/C. There are high ceiling fans and I pulled an oscillating fan from the closet but the windows don't open and when the temp was warm, the room was even warmer. Lots of cute places to walk around downtown and though others have mentioned parking problems, we had no issues with the parking pass provided.
So nice! Awesome surroundings! Very patient and pleasant hosts.
Great location and very accommodating hosts!
Last minute stay and it turned out great !! Thanks !

Downtown Wapakoneta was surprisingly fun and lively and neat to explore. The apartment is perfect for a fun weekend getaway. Would suggest the free street parking a couple blocks away. We were given a parking pass that said we could park overnight in the downtown area right in front of the apartment but my friend got a ticket anyway.

Great spot, adorable furnishings and decor. Owners are quick to respond and flexible with checkin—willing to ensure that your stay goes off without a hitch. The bed is super comfy—definitely provides a good nights rest! I recommend a this space to anyone!

John-William and Kaitlynn place is decorated nicely. Matches pictures. Bathroom is a little smaller than what I expected but it does the job.
The apartment is on the second floor above there restaurant. They do play music and have trivia nights. The restaurant does close at 10 during the week and 11 weekends. So the noise is done 30-45 minutes after closing.
It is located on the old Main Street so lots of neat shops restaurant....unfortunately I did not get a chance to check them.
There is no overnight parking on the street. You can park 3 short blocks away in a church parking lot. The property is a 100 year old building or older so not much insulation to absorb noises. The space is toasty warm due two electric fireplaces.
They are very quick to respond to any questions.
place was great....highly recommend when visiting Wapakoneta.
Communication was great. Hosts were very accommodating. There isn’t free parking on the premises. I’d recommend this place for a night or two, but not a long term stay.

I loved the location in Wapak! Such a fun place above a restaurant and a donut shop across the street. The hosts are very accommodating and easy to communicate with. The space is historic and quaint with modern touches. It also had a smart TV with Netflix and a comfy bed. I encourage anyone to stay here!
Overall really great experience for a quick weekend getaway! Campground was very nice and the tiny home we stayed in was great! Super clean and had everything we needed.

The spot was perfect. It was convenient for fishing and to see the ducks. The home was cute & we loved the deck/outdoor area. We liked that it was only a 10 min drive to town.
There were some things we did not like, however.
-The pictures are misleading. A tornado had recently gone through the area so most amenities aren’t able to be used. I was not informed of this until 3 days before our check in and it was not included in the listing. This was too short of notice to find somewhere else to stay had we chosen to do that.
-The cleaning fee seems too high. The linens and towels did seem clean, but the floors and shower did not. My husband ended up going to the store to get Clorox wipes so I could clean the shower before we used it. I understand wanting people to wash their own dishes and take out their garbage, but the $120 cleaning fee should cover the rest of the cleaning.
Overall, we did enjoy our stay.
We enjoyed our stay. We will be back in the summer to enjoy everything they have to offer.

The house was even better then the pictures. Comforts of your own home but away from all the hustle and bussel. We came in for our annoversary and the races ar Eldora. It was nice to come back to a place that felt like home and not a hotel room after long rainy days at the track. I have saw some reviews about the sulfur smell of the water but we are from the country and used to well water it isnt over powering. We are planning more trips to Eldora and this will be our choice of placea to stay as ling as its available. The park its self seems fun and has a lot of thing to take part in and enjoy especially furing the main season. The only downfall was matresses could be a little better but it beats the ground. 10 out of 10 for us. And we drove 7 hours.
Everything was nice, heat did not work though me and my two young children had a hard time keeping warm at night

Was a beautiful park. Cottage was nice. Lots of amenities for kids. Down sides were High sulphor smell from water and zero service. If looking to disconnect from your phone or electronics this is the place. Kitchen was well stocked. Recommended upgrades would be be a better mattress( very uncomfortable) and a broom would of been nice. Outdoor fireplace was not working yet. Overall nice place for the price.

We had such an amazing time on this stay. The tiny house we stayed in was so adorable. There is so much to do at the glacier hills lakes resort and rv park that we didn't want to leave! The whole community was so welcoming and friendly. The house was spotless and had everything we needed.
Was in town for work and needed a quite place....this was perfect
Very nice place in a great part of town. Exceptionally clean and had everything we needed. Will definitely stay again when available

Emily is a first-class host and is very responsive. This is the second property of hers we have stayed in and both more than met our needs. The only two down-sides for us were no tv's in either bedroom, and the carpets appear to be very dated.

Very nice and quiet place to stay. This was a rebook for me as I was satisfied the first visit. I will stay here again.
Walkable to the downtown and local hair salon.

Good place for what we needed.
Great stay

Place is as described and we enjoyed our stay. Would stay there again

prompt and polite. would stay again

We had a great time staying at Emilys place! It was so homey that we really felt like we were at home, especially with being able yo bring our pets along for the trip! Would definitely stay with Emily again.
This is a great place to stay. It’s clean and comfy. We felt safe being across from the sheriffs department. We plan to stay here again next time we’re in town.
I’ve stayed all over Ohio and I’d put this in my top 3 bnbs. Very very clean book with confidence!

Emily’s place was exactly as described and a nice place to stay in Wapak. I ended up having a family issue and had to ask for a late check out. She accommodated with no issues and was very kind and responsive in all of our communications. I will gladly stay at Emily’s next time I’m in town.

Just look at this place. The pictures don't lie. We felt right at home as soon as we walked in. Cozy, but spacious for two, plus company.
And what a plus to have use of the garage. Emily and Kurt were both very responsive and helpful. Don't hesitate. Just book it, Danno!
Very comfortable home with all the amenities you will need. I had my bike on my van, so it was nice to pull in the garage for security reasons. Super simple check in & Emily was easy to work with.
Great place clean and homey would definitely stay there again
Emily’s place was superb! It has everything we need and garage parking was a bonus.
Emily’s place was incredibly cozy and comfortable! Clean, comfortable, and welcoming.

This is the second time we have stayed with Emily. The home and area are great and we have never had any issues and will be staying here again if we're in the area.
Emily’s home was absolutely beautiful and so very comfortable. I felt right at home the entire time.

Emily's place was awesome... my wife loved the kitchen and all Emily had provided for amenities. We have stayed at Many Airbnb's.... the value on her place was unbelievable.... Thanks Emily... when visiting my college roommate again, you're my CLEAR choice.
We were very pleased with our stay! Very clean and had everything we needed. We will definitely stay again!
This is a great place to stay and the price is perfect! It feels like home!
Great stay

WHAT A GEM OF A PLACE!! We actually had a two-bedroom home (part of duplex) that actually had an available garage. The home was cozy and comfortable with all the ammenities. Wow, Emily had us stocked for snacks and mini meals (even sausage biscuits for the morning) ans about all the dishwear we could imagine (so many AirBBs no longer provide the extras and have cups, glasses, cultery, and dishes missing, though they charge increasingly more like it's an easy gravy train, not a guest-based business!!). Lots of good restaurants in the area, and lots to do in the general area. we hope to get back later this year.

You can't go wrong with Emily's property here!!
Great listing
